name: Chambre de Commerce et d'Industrie Région Centre Val de Loire
membership:
Enterprise Europe Network
Member of the french chamber of commerce network (CCI France)
goal:
Defence of interests of companies established in the region
- economic development
- promotion of policies implemented by the European Union
- support for development of business relationships
- innovation support
interests: Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Enterprise, Environment, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Information Society, Research and Technology, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: structural funds, reglementation (data protection, medical devises, Injonction of payment, ...), innovation (SME instrument), Horizon 2020 (especially the insertion of SME in research consortiums).
